cast.name: 约瑟芬·约伯特 Joséphine Jobert
伊丽莎白·布尔吉娜 Élisabeth Bourgine
丹尼·约翰-儒勒 Danny John-Jules
茱丽叶特·斯蒂文森 Juliet Stevenson
斯坦利·汤森德 Stanley Townsend
乔斯林·杰·艾森 Jocelyn Jee Esien
安东尼·凯尔夫 Anthony Calf
泰莎·波纳姆·琼斯 Tessa Bonham Jones

trans_title: 天堂岛疑云：2021圣诞特别集
introduction: It’s Christmas time on Saint Marie and Neville is preparing to head to Manchester to spend the holiday with his family. But his plans are abruptly changed when a billionaire shipping magnate dies in mysterious circumstances.Things only get stranger when a minicab driver in London receives a Christmas card with an ominous message inside that turns the entire case on its head. For Neville and the team, will this be a case they can crack together?Following the series ten cliff-hanger that left everybody swinging in suspense, Florence is jetting off for Christmas, leaving the team a member down. So, the Commissioner decides to enlist the help of retired officer, Dwayne Myers (Danny John-Jules). Alongside Marlon, Dwayne employs his unique style of policing to help investigate the case. Left to their own devices, the pair struggle on the best plan of action for apprehending a suspect. As rain falls, tensions rise - but as Christmas Day approaches, will they realise they’re more like one another than they originally thought?
chinese_title: 天堂岛疑云：2021圣诞特别集
